page.title: 07Recreation in Stithians.
page.content: Stithians has not got many amusements so people go off to different places. We have board games like Chess, Cludo and snakes and ladders. We have outdoor games like tap tap and in, tig and British bulldog. Some boys play cricket and football. Some people get bored with these games and go to the leisure centre to do sports and swimming. The adults go to bingo, bowls, tennis club, snooker/billiards and choirs. Some parents go to different meetings and parties. The teenagers go to discos in and out of the village. People go to the Seven Stars for a drink. The reservoir is very popular for water sports like windsurfing, sailing and waterskiing. You need a licence to fish.
